agent

Class AgentMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.AgentMessage

  • public class AgentMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for communication between two agents. The agent that reads the message acts accordingly to it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ASSIST_IN_BLOCKING_TYPE 
      static java.lang.String CLIENT_LOCATION_TYPE 
      static java.lang.String CONFIRM_TYPE 
      static java.lang.String DENY_TYPE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentMessage(Agent sender, Agent recipient, java.lang.String type)
      Works exactly like #AgentMessage(agent.Agent, agent.Agent, java.lang.String, java.util.List) except this constructor is used for the confirm and deny message where the type of the message speaks by itself and no further actions are needed.
      AgentMessage(Agent sender, Agent recipient, java.lang.String type, java.util.List<Place> content)
      A message includes the recipient, sender, type and content.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgentMessage

        public AgentMessage(Agent sender,
                    Agent recipient,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.util.List<Place> content)
        A message includes the recipient, sender, type and content.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of the message
        recipient - The recipient of the message
        type - The type of the message (predefined)
        content - The content of the message (a list of places)

      • AgentMessage

        public AgentMessage(Agent sender,
                    Agent recipient,
                    java.lang.String type)
        Works exactly like #AgentMessage(agent.Agent, agent.Agent, java.lang.String, java.util.List) except this constructor is used for the confirm and deny message where the type of the message speaks by itself and no further actions are needed.

        AgentMessage(agent.Agent, agent.Agent, java.lang.String, java.util.List)

      • readMessage

        public boolean readMessage()
        The recipient reads the sender's message and acts accordingly. If the action requested by the sender can be completed then the recipient sends true indicating a "confirm" reply (which is handled in the Agent's function). In case of a confirm or deny message acting on it is not needed and true is the result always.
        Returns:
        true if confirm or deny or action can be completed, false if not.
